# QR Games

Games that fit in a QR code.

Since `javascript:` URLs don't scan directly any more, this uses the [Itty Bitty Site](https://itty.bitty.site/#) service to display the game in the browser.

To play the game, scan the QR code.

## Snek

![Snek QR Code](snek.png)

## Developer instructions

Instructions for future me to remember how to set up builds.

1. `npm install`

   Installs the tons of dependencies. (or, just `qrnode`)

2. `npm run snek`

   Convert the snek.html to QRCode.
